bodyV2.markdown:
Frozen The Musical is 2 hours 15 minutes (incl. interval). For a 7:00PM performance, the show will finish at approximately 9:15PM. For regular matinee performances at 2:00PM the show will finish at roughly 4:15PM. Please note that on Sunday's the matinee performance begins at 1PM and the evening one at 5:30PMÂ 

Book Tickets

content.name: How long is Frozen The Musical and when does it finish?
